LanguageData.Building_Heater.label: 烤炉
LanguageData.Building_Heater.description: A stove that produces heat by burning basic fuel sources. Can be fueled by kindling, coal, charcoal, peat and wooden stuff.
LanguageData.Building_Heater_Blueprint.label: 烤炉 (蓝图)
LanguageData.Building_Heater_Frame.label: 烤炉 (建造中)
LanguageData.Building_Heater_Frame.description: A stove that produces heat by burning basic fuel sources. Can be fueled by kindling, coal, charcoal, peat and wooden stuff.
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor.label: 电加热地板
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor.description: Heated flooring tiles that utilize conductive wires and convection heating to warm a room.
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor_Blueprint.label: 电加热地板 (蓝图)
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor_Frame.label: 电加热地板 (建造中)
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor_Frame.description: Heated flooring tiles that utilize conductive wires and convection heating to warm a room.
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery.label: 冰石制冷器
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery.description: A tank built to cool a medium-sized room to below freezing. Requires coldstone as fuel. Able to support a roof.
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery_Blueprint.label: 冰石制冷器 (蓝图)
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery_Frame.label: 冰石制冷器 (建造中)
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery_Frame.description: A tank built to cool a medium-sized room to below freezing. Requires coldstone as fuel. Able to support a roof.
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge.label: 温度计
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge.description: Displays the current ambient temperature and can be configured to provide temperature based alerts. Does not require power.
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Blueprint.label: 温度计 (蓝图)
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Blueprint_Install.label: 温度计 (蓝图)
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Frame.label: 温度计 (建造中)
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Frame.description: Displays the current ambient temperature and can be configured to provide temperature based alerts. Does not require power.
LanguageData.GH.label: 地热加热器
LanguageData.GH.description: A industrial geothermal heater that collects and controls the heat from a steam geyser. It is self-balanced and can heat up a large indoor area to a comfortable temperature.
LanguageData.GH_Blueprint.label: 地热加热器 (蓝图)
LanguageData.GH_Frame.label: 地热加热器 (建造中)
LanguageData.GH_Frame.description: A industrial geothermal heater that collects and controls the heat from a steam geyser. It is self-balanced and can heat up a large indoor area to a comfortable temperature.
LanguageData.MiningHelmetGlower.label: 矿盔灯
